"Dare I say, magical"

"Dare I say, magical" — Steven Aquino: Apple Pay is a huge step forward for accessibility at the cash register. People with low vision can just tap their finger to Touch ID and pay; no more fiddling around with credit cards.

Published 26 October 2014
